# 2019 Queen's Club Championships – Wheelchair singles__disambig_1

Alfie Hewett
| runner   =  Gordon Reid
| score    = 6–2, 7–5
| type     = queensclubtennistournament
| after_year = 2021
}}
Stefan Olsson was the defending champion but lost in the semifinals to Gordon Reid.
Alfie Hewett won the title, defeating Reid in the final, 6–2, 7–5.
Seeds
Joachim Gérard (quarterfinals)
